publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-854# Mark Ballard: Student Community Relations—That the Parliament commends the efforts of Edinburgh University Students’ Association in organising the Edinburgh Student Festival and a community forum as a means to improving community relations between students and those they live around in Edinburgh and supports all efforts to encourage harmony in communities that include students. Supported by: Patrick Harvie*

S2M-854# Mark Ballard: Student Community Relations-That the Parliament commends the efforts of Edinburgh University Students' Association in organising the Edinburgh Student Festival and a community forum as a means to improving community relations between students and those they live around in Edinburgh and supports all efforts to encourage harmony in communities that include students. Supported by: Patrick Harvie
S2M-854# Student Community Relations (lodged on 3 February 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-854# Student Community Relations (lodged on 3 February 2004) Donald Gorrie*
